Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO MENTAL HEALTH

Title: Relates to clarifying the standards for involuntary in-patient care and treatment
Summary: Relates to involuntary in-patient mental health treatment where care and treatment in a hospital is essential to a person's welfare if, in the absence of such care and treatment, the person's mental illness is likely to result in serious harm.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to clarifying the standards for involuntary in-patient care and treatment
